SEARCH
Package Engine

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
Engine.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
The Camera class represents a camera in the game engine. It is responsible for controlling the view of the game world.
Author:
woojin

    • getPosition

      public Vector2 getPosition()
      Returns the position of the camera. If the camera mode is set to Custom and there is no subject, the position is returned. If the camera mode is not Custom and there is a subject, the center of the subject is returned.
      Returns:
      The position of the camera.
